name: The Sublime Object of Ideology
description:
This work sees that a thought or understanding cannot be taken from the influence of other institutions outside their respective institutions. Because every individual has the right to choose and has certain principles, guidelines and ideologies from what he feels is right for him.
 
Sometimes, one side or the other is dealing with an ego that is higher than his senses. The representation of a skull with a burning brain becomes a hyperbole of a heated ego and decadent rationality. By removing things around them from what they were meant to contain. Anything that should be a place or board for the growth of plurality, actually becomes alienated from its essential nature.
